source.context_span: At the juncture of the corridor, to the north is a dead end with a phone. To the south is the foyer. To the east is the corridor that leads to the Fox Chamber.

gold.testimony: A statue had fallen to the floor. It was a token of goodwill celebrating the municipal merger.

testimony.testimony: The yokai feathers and tracks weren't there before the Fox Chamber was opened.

gold.testimony: TRAGEDY is DOOMED to repeat as long as Tenma Taro exists.

testimony.testimony: ...and THAT would bring RUIN upon Nine-Tails Vale, just as the superstitions say.

gold.testimony: I'm positive it was Juniper because she was wearing the costume that she had made! [caption] The photo shows the back of a figure in a plain blue costume.

The photo shows the back of a figure in a plain blue costume.
source.explanation: The defendant's costume should have a glowing star pattern, not plain.

gold.testimony: I didn't talk to anyone until the final bell. I'd been meditating alone at the archery range.

testimony.testimony: Oh, let me add I never went to the art room. There was no reason for me to be there.

gold.testimony: I was watching her from a vantage point between the stage and the maintenance area.

testimony.testimony: She was heading towards me, so I assume she was on her way to the maintenance area.

gold.testimony: But when I said I would protect Juniper, I meant it because it's the humane thing to do.

testimony.testimony: She also said I'd become an accomplice after losing my alibi due to the pre-recording.

gold.testimony: Mommy Metis fell down near the round window on the workbench side of the room!

testimony.testimony: I went to the robotics lab at about 2 PM for my regular recharge!

gold.testimony: Three prints were on the lighter: the thumb, index, and middle fingers of a right hand!

testimony.testimony: What we DO have is proof that Athena Cykes is the culprit: this lighter with her prints on it!

gold.testimony: What reason would the phantom have to be afraid of the moon rock?! None at all!

testimony.testimony: So the very fact that I'm afraid of the moon rock means I'm not him!

gold.testimony: I saw the killer whale bite the victim to death with its huge mouth and deadly teeth!

testimony.testimony: I saw the killer whale bite the victim to death with its huge mouth and deadly teeth!

evidence_span: Instant death from a brain contusion. There are signs of blunt force trauma all over the body.
source.testimony_span: the killer whale bite the victim to death
source.explanation: If the victim is bitten to death, he would not have died from brain contusion or blunt force trauma.

gold.testimony: At about 10:10 AM, I was in the staff room.

testimony.testimony: I couldn't see the captain or the orca, but I saw a bunch of coins scattered around.

gold.testimony: If there were no water in the pool, the orca might die.

testimony.testimony: During cleaning, the pool water is drained.

gold.testimony: Orla killed the captain by bashin' him thirty feet high and makin' him slam into the water!

testimony.testimony: Orla killed the captain by bashin' him thirty feet high and makin' him slam into the water!

gold.testimony: The defendant's prints were on the tape. I guess she must've moved it during the show.

testimony.testimony: He then intended to reveal the secrets behind their magic tricks during the show.

gold.testimony: That's right. It's a very dangerous trick, so I had to make sure we were prepared for it.

testimony.testimony: That's right. It's a very dangerous trick, so I had to make sure we were prepared for it.

source.explanation: Not only was it empty, but dust lines the inside of the pail.
source.context_span: The script has this to say about the fire trick: "This will be dangerous. Make sure the fire bucket is ready!"

gold.testimony: ...I used my binoculars to spy on the rite at the Inner Sanctum.

testimony.testimony: That's when I saw the accused... stab the high priest with a dagger!

gold.testimony: The figures were created by the light of the full moon on that clear and still night.

testimony.testimony: She was just a shadow, but I could tell it was the accused, reverse-gripping that dagger!
reasoning: Fact 1: The witness claims he saw shadows on the ritual curtain.
Fact 2: The evidence suggests the moon was directly above the summit of Mt. Poniponi.
Fact 3: The context suggests the witness was at the top of Mt. Poniponi.
Prop 1: If a light source is directly above an observer, it will cast shadows of an observed object on the opposite side of the observer.
Prop 2: If the observed object is surrounded by curtains, an outside observer cannot see the shadows cast on the opposite side of the curtains.

gold.testimony: It's not like I can fly through the air, either!

testimony.testimony: Besides, it woulda been impossible to get there in the first place!

gold.testimony: Gale force winds came out of nowhere, so I made an emergency landing at the sanctum!

testimony.testimony: Gale force winds came out of nowhere, so I made an emergency landing at the sanctum!

source.evidence_span: The area around the Inner Sanctum will enjoy calm, clear skies today.

gold.testimony: I would describe the noise as a terrible crash. Poor Zeh'lot... It must have felt so heavy.

testimony.testimony: It sounded like an altercation between Acolyte Zeh'lot and Acolyte Fey.

gold.testimony: She is a spirit medium who knows Lady Kee'ra's true name, so she could have done it.

testimony.testimony: She attacked and killed me with a strength far beyond any mortal woman.

gold.testimony: As for the relic at the center of this dispute, he likely stole it from the Atishon residence.

testimony.testimony: It seems the doctor would do anything to study artifacts, including steal them.

gold.testimony: I had no idea Dr. Buff was dead. That's why I didn't call the police.

testimony.testimony: He was running out the front door.

gold.testimony: I didn't have eyes on the ground, as I'd already mounted my siege defense, but...

testimony.testimony: From my window, I saw the one designated "Datz" getting ejected from the premises.

gold.testimony: The doctor was standing in front of the bookshelves, absorbed in a book.

testimony.testimony: The doctor was standing in front of the bookshelves, absorbed in a book.

source.evidence_span: The doctor's poor eyesight meant he couldn't read anything without these. They were found on his desk.

source.explanation: The doctor requires the glasses to read anything. Since the glasses were found on his desk, he must have been reading at the desk, not the bookshelves..

gold.testimony: The possibility of a third party being there in the tomb is probably nonexistent.

testimony.testimony: And lying right in front of me was Inga, dead as a doornail.

gold.testimony: I had been gazing upon the courtyard since about 2, but father was the only one I saw.
After Queen Amara's passing, Her Eminence, Queen Ga'ran is the only spirit medium left.
Minister Inga was the sole victim. There was no other spirit to channel until he was dead.
There is nothing to prove I was even at the scene of the crime.
I was reunited with my mother, Queen Amara, fifteen years ago when Dhurke abducted her.
